name: Lost in the 80's
description:
It's the 80's and you are rocking in you maze of a shop! A cooky old man comes in, and decides to start giving you all these request for items that make so sense! Nevertheless, you are faithful to your shop and want to get the job done! Watch out though! The old's man's item requests seem to enchant your body is strange ways! Get the item, adapt to the change, and deliver before the time runs out!

Arrow Keys - Move.
Space - Jump
